name: PerfectBusiness
tag_list: startup, business, entrepreneur, funding, networking, internet, business-plan
overview:
PerfectBusiness.com is an online business incubator that connects entrepreneurs with the people and resources needed to start a business.

This website offers services for new and existing businesses. Services include Business Plan Builder (online business plan software - Saas), Pitch Center (startup funding presentations) and business networking, plus entrepreneur videos, articles and webinars.

Strategic partner of Entrepreneur Magazine, LegalZoom and Virgin Money.

PerfectBusiness produces all interview videos in-house and produces all of the video content for Entrepreneur Magazine. High-profile interviews include the founders or CEOs of: Trader Joe’s - national retail chain Kinko’s - copy store chain bought by FedEx Robek’s Juice - retail juice chain Wahoo’s Fish Taco - restaurant chain Red Mango - frozen yogurt chain Sunset Tan - tanning chain and television program World Poker Tour - professional poker tour Baywatch - television series LegalZoom.com - online legal services Plus many other entrepreneurs, venture capital investors, lawyers, professors, publicists and small business experts.
